com.marklogic.client.modulesloader.tokenreplacer

Class DefaultModuleTokenReplacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.client.helper.LoggingObject
      • com.marklogic.client.modulesloader.tokenreplacer.DefaultModuleTokenReplacer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModuleTokenReplacer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoxyModuleTokenReplacer

    public class DefaultModuleTokenReplacer
extends LoggingObject
implements ModuleTokenReplacer
    Default implementation of ModuleTokenReplacer that relies on a list of PropertiesSource implementations for finding tokens to replace in modules.

    Based on Roxy conventions of referencing properties in module text with "@ml." as a prefix, this class also by default will attempt to find property names in module text with "@ml." as a prefix. This can be adjusted via the propertyPrefix property.
